analyses.title: Sales Overview Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze overall sales metrics to understand the performance of the café.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales Calculation
sub_analyses.why: Evaluate the overall revenue generated by the café.
answers: The total sales amount over the dataset period.

sub_analyses.title: Transaction Count
sub_analyses.why: Determine the number of transactions to assess sales volume.
answers: The total number of transactions recorded.

sub_analyses.title: Average Transaction Value
sub_analyses.why: Assess the average spend per transaction to gauge sales efficiency.
answers: The average amount spent per transaction.

analyses.title: Item Sales Insights
analyses.context: Examine item-level sales to understand product performance.

sub_analyses.title: Top Selling Items
sub_analyses.why: Identify items with the highest number of sales to focus on popular products.
answers: List of items ranked by total quantity sold.

sub_analyses.title: Revenue by Item
sub_analyses.why: Understand which items contribute most to revenue.
answers: Total revenue generated by each item.

analyses.title: Payment Method Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze payment methods used to understand customer preferences.

sub_analyses.title: Payment Method Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Identify customer preference for payment types.
answers: Proportion of each payment method used.

analyses.title: Location-Based Sales Insights
analyses.context: Understand sales performance across different locations.

sub_analyses.title: Sales by Location
sub_analyses.why: Examine which locations are generating the most sales.
answers: Total sales volume and revenue by location.

sub_analyses.title: Sales Over Time
sub_analyses.why: Identify trends and patterns in sales over the analysis period.
answers: Total sales volume and revenue over time, defined by periods.
